channel.title: computer architecture on AshLogs
channel.description: Recent content in computer architecture on AshLogs

item.title: Hacking Casio Calculator
item.description: Deep dive into hacking the Casio fx-991es calculator by exploiting buffer overflow vulnerabilities in its nX-u8 chip architecture. Learn about Harvard architecture, memory manipulation, and ROP techniques.

item.title: 9's complement Method: Computers use those?
item.description: Learn how computers use 9's complement method for subtraction using the same circuit as addition. A practical guide to computer arithmetic.
